full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 (COAT OF ARMS) THE MINISTRY OF PUBLIC HEALTH WHEREAS: Captain (Medical Corps) of the National Guard, JOSE ANTONIO ROMAN AVELLAN, a native of Jinotepe, Department of Carazo has served proficiently and efficiently during more than TWENTY YEARS as a TECHNICAL BACTERIOLOGIST in the National Health Institute, and pursuant to Decree Number Thirty-Eight issued by this Department, dated May tenth, Nineteen Hundred and Forty-Nine. (SEAL) (PHOTO) WHEREAS: Dept. of Public Health- Rep. of Nicaragua Captain (Medical Corps) of the National Guard, JOSE ANTONIO ROMAN AVELLAN is granted this Diploma of TECHNICAL BACTERIOLOGIST signed and sealed with the official seal of the Department of Public Health in order for him to benefit from all the rights and privileges appertaining thereto in accordance with the Law. Issued in Managua, National District, on the twenty-seventh day of the month of May, NIneteen Hundred and Forty Nine. The Minister of Public Health /s/ Alej. Seq. Rivas (Rubber Seal) The Director of the Medical Secretary of National Health Institute the Depart. of Public Health /s/ M. A. Sanchez Vigil /s/ C. Baltodano Recorded on Pg. 235 , under No. 785 in the Registy Book of the Dept. of Public Health Managua, January 29, 1951 (Rubber Stamp) The Clerk, /s/ Rodrigo Sanchez Health Dept. Recording Vol. I, , Pg. 167-168 Entry No. 333 . /s/ Jose Fernandez
